metadata.title: CVE-2012-2397 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
Cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in ownCloud before 3.0.3allows remote attackers to hijack the authentication of arbitrary users forrequests that insert cross-site scripting (XSS) sequences via vectorsinvolving contacts.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-2397` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

owncloud - 4.0.7debian-1ubuntu1
owncloud-mysql - 4.0.7debian-1ubuntu1
owncloud-pgsql - 4.0.7debian-1ubuntu1
owncloud-sqlite - 4.0.7debian-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: owncloud package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.0.7debian-1ubuntu1').
